title: VOWELS: Long Sounds, Short Sounds
description: THE reference book chosen by children and young adults to learn to identify and use long and short vowels.Each vowel (A, E, I, O, U and sometimes Y) has been given its own section which includes sample pictures, an illustrated hint page, and sample words.Students, parents, and teachers will have a wonderful experience utilizing this fun and interactive reference book.Educators will appreciate the bonus section that provides fun activity pages such as crossword puzzles, coloring pages, and sentences to confirm what has been learned. This is THE vowel handbook.
author: Deirdrie LoVerso
